summary: E-commerce fashion store for transwomen featuring creative and vanguardist designs with brand color #a932bd and fullscreen slides at homepage
architectural_notes: E-commerce platform targeting transwomen fashion market
Visual design should emphasize creativity and avant-garde aesthetics

existing_features.title: Build a fullscreen slideshow carousel component for the homepage that displays hero images with smooth transitions
Create a product listing page that displays all available fashion items in a grid layout with images, names, and prices
Create a product detail page that shows full product information including description, available sizes, colors, and add-to-cart functionality
Build a shopping cart page that displays cart items with quantities, allows quantity updates and item removal, and shows the total price

Implement a creative and vanguardist design aesthetic throughout the site with the brand color #a932bd as the primary accent color, featuring bold typography, modern layouts, and artistic visual elements that celebrate transwomen fashion

Replace the placeholder 'Vanguard' text logo in the Layout component header with the uploaded tsgabrielle logo, using the purple version (tsgabrielle-logo (1).png) for light backgrounds and the white version (tsgabrielle-logo-white.png) for dark backgrounds, with appropriate theme-based switching
Update all references to 'Vanguard' branding throughout the application to use 'TS Gabrielle' as the brand name, including page titles, meta tags, and any text content that references the brand

Add holographic gradient effects to product cards that shift colors and create an iridescent appearance on hover, using CSS gradients with multiple color stops including the brand color #a932bd and complementary hues
Apply holographic border effects to interactive elements including buttons, the add-to-cart button, and the cart icon in the header, using animated gradient borders that create an iridescent shimmer

Add holographic text effects to headings and brand elements including the hero carousel titles and section headings, using background-clip text technique with animated gradients to create shimmering, iridescent typography

Create a subtle holographic background effect for the hero carousel slides and key landing sections, using layered gradients with opacity changes to add depth and a futuristic aesthetic that complements the vanguardist design direction
Make the header navigation in the Layout component transparent with a backdrop blur effect, removing the solid background while maintaining readability

Transform the Layout component header navigation into a mega menu structure that displays expanded dropdown panels on hover for main navigation items (Home, Products, Cart), featuring multi-column layouts with links, descriptions, and promotional content

Apply holographic gradient effects to the header navigation elements including nav links and the cart icon, using animated gradient borders and background effects that create iridescent shimmer consistent with the existing holographic effects on product cards and buttons, featuring the brand color #a932bd

Add holographic gradient effects to the mega menu dropdown panels, including iridescent borders around the panel containers and subtle holographic background gradients that complement the transparent header and create visual cohesion with the vanguardist design aesthetic

Apply holographic gradient effects to the cart items in the Cart page, including iridescent borders around cart item containers and subtle holographic background shimmer on hover, consistent with existing holographic effects using the brand color #a932bd

Add holographic gradient effects to the feature cards on the homepage, including animated iridescent borders and subtle holographic background gradients that create shimmer effects consistent with the vanguardist design aesthetic
Apply holographic effects to the quantity controls and remove buttons in cart items, using animated gradient borders that create iridescent shimmer on hover and active states

Add holographic gradient effects to the checkout/total price section in the cart, including an iridescent border around the total price container and subtle holographic background that emphasizes the call-to-action

new_feature_requests.summary: E-commerce fashion store with product catalog and shopping cart
Brand color scheme with primary color #a932bd
Creative and vanguardist design aesthetic for transwomen fashion
Create a product catalog system in the backend that stores fashion items with fields for name, description, price, sizes, colors, and image URLs
Create a shopping cart system in the backend that allows adding items, updating quantities, and calculating totals
Create logo images for both light and dark backgrounds
Add holographic effects to the design
Make header menu transparent with mega menu and holographic effects
